titleStmt.title: The whole duty of divine meditation described in all its various parts and branches : with meditations on several places of scripture / by the author of The whole duty of man.
titleStmt.author: Allestree, Richard, 1619-1681.

notesStmt.note: "The whole duty of man" is attributed to Richard Allestree--Cf. DNB.
Reproduction of original in the University of Illinois (Urbana-Champaign Campus). Library.
